reviews.title: Fix it
reviews.text: This app needs to tell WHEN im going to arrive to my destination, because it makes me late so many times even when i book earlier. So pls fix this and add the timing of arrival to destination.

reviews.title: Most annoying app
reviews.text: This app has made me late for work so many times, it literally took 30mins to pick me up after it said 5 mins pick up, it would pick up people who are in traffic locations and the rest of us have to suffer for it
